channel.title: Mephobia 718 | New Godwars | Lava Flow | Quests | Avatar of Destruction | Dung
channel.description:
[ul][center][img]http://puu.sh/23eis[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YRY9JFp6OW4[/youtube]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] Website: [size=12pt][url=http://mephobia.x10.mx]http://mephobiarsps.webs.com[/url][/size]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/jfx7v4.png[/img] Download: [size=12pt][url=http://mephobia.x10.mx/Mephobia718.jar]http://mephobiarsps.webs.com/Mephobia718.jar[/url][/size]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] Play Now: [size=12pt][url=http://mintx.juplo.com/play.htm]http://mintx.juplo.com/play.htm[/url][/size]
No lag. DDos Protected Dedicated server Daily/Weekly updates. Decent drop rates, also double drops weekend. Good XP rates for skilling and combat. Donator zone for our awesome donators :) Staff listens to your suggestions. Years of experience of owning a server. Community = awesome
[size=12pt][b]Features:[/b][/size] Pyramid Plunder Dominion Tower Dungeoneering (custom) Artisan Workshop Gilded Altar Squeal of Fortune Money Pouch (Shop and trade Support) Clan Wars Safe and Risk portal for fun fights. Duel Arena with Staking. Recipe for Diaster Boss fight (Instanced map just like runescape) Glacors with fire spell weekness. Forinthry Dungeon for pvp items. Loyalty Shop Kuradals Dungeon FightCaves/Fight Kiln Queen Black Dragon Barrows Zombies Minigame Lava Flow Mining Jadinko Lair Frost Dragons Slayer Tower with all floors (including slayer task system) Polypore Dungeon Corporeal Beast Kalphite Queen Bork Tormented Demons New Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cuTEHRA.jpg?1[/img] [/center]
